html:
Jan 27 (Reuters) - UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP NV UMG.AS:: *UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP EXPANDS RELATIONSHIP ACROSS AMAZON MUSIC AND TWITCH *TWITCH TO COLLABORATE WITH UMG ON ORIGINAL CONTENT FOR LIVE STREAMING SERVICE *TWITCH HAS ALSO AGREED TO PROVIDE COMMERCIAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR UMG AND ITS ARTISTS TO ENGAGE DIRECTLY WITH FANS THROUGH ITS SUITE OF PRODUCTS *ADDITIONALLY, TWITCH AND UMG WILL WORK TOGETHER TO FOSTER NEW INNOVATIVE OPPORTUNITIES FOR ARTISTS AND LABELS TO CREATIVELY AND COMMERCIALLY ENGAGE WITH THEIR FANS AND NEW AUDIENCES


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 27-JAN-202214:00:32.92 GMT
